data.title: St Augustine of Canterbury Catholic Academy
data.meta_description: Here at St Augustine of Canterbury, we provide an exceptional Catholic education for students across St Helens. Visit our Homepage page to learn more.
data.text:
We can't wait to meet our Year 7 students in September!

We are committed to supporting our starters' wellbeing as they start their Secondary journey with us, but we also want our parents to be prepared for all challenges ahead.

Get informed: https://buff.ly/435yHJG

Congratulations to 11SS for winning the attendance week.

A great sign of our core value ASPIRATION, recognising the importance of attendance in order to achieve the best outcomes in their upcoming GCSE examinations.

Well done everyone!

We work in close partnership with local primaries to help get our new starters used to their new routine and environment.

If you have any questions or concerns about moving up to St Augustine, get in touch: https://buff.ly/3V7jhmv

Our Year 7 starters will be joining us soon, and we want to ensure they have all the resources they need to feel at home in their new school.

Here's some advice on how to make the move that much smoother: https://buff.ly/42QGFpj

We can’t wait to meet our new Year 7 students.

Our work with local primary schools means that we’re well-prepared for our new students’ needs.

We want them to have the confidence to thrive in their new learning environment. Get to know us: https://buff.ly/439cM4D

Your child is in safe hands coming to St Augustine.

We’re proud to work with our upcoming students’ primary schools to ensure every child’s needs, abilities and feelings are considered. Discover our curriculum and how we prepare for the future: https://buff.ly/435KFmO

We work closely with local primary schools to ensure that children coming to us in Year 7 are confident and excited about what's to come.

Making sure your child feels prepared for the next step in their education is our priority. Get to know us: https://buff.ly/439cM4D
